$interpreted: Emily: Congratulations!
Man: Always be in love and grow old together!

Lisa: Thank you for the blessings~
We will always be in love with each other!
Ned: So, Sir Sherlock really didn't come.
Lisa: Don't mention his name. It's better that he's not here.
Ned: I say we should still visit Sir Sherlock, perhaps sometime after the wedding ceremony?
Lisa: We'll see then...

Lisa: ... I, I'm not here because I worry about him. 
It's because Ned wants me to come; that's the only reason I'm here to see him.
Lisa: He's not here? Where did he go?
Emily: Lisa, why are you here? Aren't you preparing for your honeymoon?
Lisa: Emily, where is my father?
Emily: Mister Sherlock?
Emily: Ah, right. You've been staying at Ned's place for the past couple of days; hence why you don't know. He hasn't opened his shop for quite a while now.
Lisa: Is that even possible for a money-grubber like him?
Emily: I have no idea why either. From what I remember, he's been in this mood since 10 days ago...

Lisa: 10 days ago? Isn't that the day I had a big argument with him... 
Where is he now?
Emily: During that time, he looks like a soulless corpse. He messed up so many things, even offended the lizard nobles of Desert Kingdom.
Emily: Right now, he's visiting the Hazardous Zone to find the previous golden desert spheres to gift to the lizard nobles as an apology...

Lisa: The Hazardous Zone!? Isn't there a ton of dangerous beasts there!?
Damnit, he better not do anything stupid!
Emily: Hey, wait up...
Lisa: Found him!
Lisa: Father!

Lisa: Father... you have to be kidding me... 
Wake up... wake up and move...

Lisa: Please... please don't die...
I haven't even said sorry to you...
Lisa: If not for you, I would have died in the desert a long time ago... I shouldn't have acted on impulse and said those mean things...
Lisa: Please wake up... I still want to continue to be your precious daughter...
Sherlock: So you've finally realized your mistake.
Lisa: I do... It was all because I was too childish...
Sherlock: Then, will you buy me motor oil as well?
Lisa: I will, I will buy them every day...
Lisa: ... Eh?
Lisa: Ah, silly me. I forgot that father's real self is the tiny robot that acts as the head.
Sherlock: Seeing as you are worried sick about me, I have no choice but to forgive you~
Lisa: If you're fine then make a damn noise, you idiot! God, I am so mad!
Lisa: Your booth is filthy and disgusting. Let's take care of this thing quickly so we can go back and clean it up!
Sherlock: Not that I don't want to... but an important piece was sent flying by the previous blow. It landed right behind that monster. Without that piece,
Sherlock: I won't be able to fix my large, mechanical body...
Lisa: Then I'll lure this thing away. Father, you use this opportunity to pick up the piece!
Sherlock: Lisa, NO!
Lisa: Father, NOW!
Lisa: Huff~ Puff... why does this guy run so fast?

Lisa: I, I just got married.
So, ummm... can you let me go?
Lisa: AHHHHHHHH!!
Ned: Lisa!
Ned: Lisa, are you alright?
Sherlock: Took me longer than expected to fix my body. Thank goodness we made it in time...
Lisa: Father, how did you and Ned...
Sherlock: He said he would gladly give his life to protect my precious daughter. If he has this kind of heart, then he is my ally~
Ned: Lisa is my wife. Naturally, it's my duty to protect her at all costs.
Sherlock: Hmph, you're a much better man than I ever expected~
Lisa: Ned, that's great news! My father has finally acknowledged you!
Sherlock: Not quite yet. Treating him as an ally and agreeing him to marry my daughter are two very different matters!
Lisa: WHAT!?
Sherlock: If you want to be acknowledged by me, find me the golden desert spheres. That's the trial for you.
Lisa: Isn't that the trial given to you by the lizard nobles!
Ned: No problem. I know where to find the golden desert spheres. I will go get them right away.
Lisa: Fa~ ther~
Sherlock: ... Ok, ok. I'll go easy on you this time and accompany you on this trip. Just this once, though!
Lisa: Then I shall accompany you guys as well!
Ned: Let's go.

Model.Text: Congratulations!
Always be in love and grow old together!

Thank you for the blessings~
We will always be in love with each other!
So, Sir Sherlock really didn't come.
Don't mention his name. It's better that he's not here.
I say we should still visit Sir Sherlock, perhaps sometime after the wedding ceremony?
We'll see then...

... I, I'm not here because I worry about him. 
It's because Ned wants me to come; that's the only reason I'm here to see him.
He's not here? Where did he go?
Lisa, why are you here? Aren't you preparing for your honeymoon?
Emily, where is my father?
Mister Sherlock?
Ah, right. You've been staying at Ned's place for the past couple of days; hence why you don't know. He hasn't opened his shop for quite a while now.
Is that even possible for a money-grubber like him?
I have no idea why either. From what I remember, he's been in this mood since 10 days ago...

10 days ago? Isn't that the day I had a big argument with him... 
Where is he now?
During that time, he looks like a soulless corpse. He messed up so many things, even offended the lizard nobles of Desert Kingdom.
Right now, he's visiting the Hazardous Zone to find the previous golden desert spheres to gift to the lizard nobles as an apology...

The Hazardous Zone!? Isn't there a ton of dangerous beasts there!?
Damnit, he better not do anything stupid!
Hey, wait up...
Found him!
Father!

Father... you have to be kidding me... 
Wake up... wake up and move...

Please... please don't die...
I haven't even said sorry to you...
If not for you, I would have died in the desert a long time ago... I shouldn't have acted on impulse and said those mean things...
Please wake up... I still want to continue to be your precious daughter...
So you've finally realized your mistake.
I do... It was all because I was too childish...
Then, will you buy me motor oil as well?
I will, I will buy them every day...
Ah, silly me. I forgot that father's real self is the tiny robot that acts as the head.
Seeing as you are worried sick about me, I have no choice but to forgive you~
If you're fine then make a damn noise, you idiot! God, I am so mad!
Your booth is filthy and disgusting. Let's take care of this thing quickly so we can go back and clean it up!
Not that I don't want to... but an important piece was sent flying by the previous blow. It landed right behind that monster. Without that piece,
I won't be able to fix my large, mechanical body...
Then I'll lure this thing away. Father, you use this opportunity to pick up the piece!
Lisa, NO!
Father, NOW!
Huff~ Puff... why does this guy run so fast?

I, I just got married.
So, ummm... can you let me go?
AHHHHHHHH!!
Lisa!
Lisa, are you alright?
Took me longer than expected to fix my body. Thank goodness we made it in time...
Father, how did you and Ned...
He said he would gladly give his life to protect my precious daughter. If he has this kind of heart, then he is my ally~
Lisa is my wife. Naturally, it's my duty to protect her at all costs.
Hmph, you're a much better man than I ever expected~
Ned, that's great news! My father has finally acknowledged you!
Not quite yet. Treating him as an ally and agreeing him to marry my daughter are two very different matters!
WHAT!?
If you want to be acknowledged by me, find me the golden desert spheres. That's the trial for you.
Isn't that the trial given to you by the lizard nobles!
No problem. I know where to find the golden desert spheres. I will go get them right away.
Fa~ ther~
... Ok, ok. I'll go easy on you this time and accompany you on this trip. Just this once, though!
Then I shall accompany you guys as well!
Let's go.
